titleStmt.title: Amsterdam: toleration, or no toleration in a discourse between conformists, non-conformists, papists, Anabaptists, Quakers, &c. In their own words, before a gracious king, about the extent of a Christian indulgence to all dissenters. By J.V.C.O. A friend to men of all religions.
titleStmt.author: J. V. C. O.

notesStmt.note: The words "conformists, .. Quakers, &c." are enclosed in braces on title page.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
